p: HeLa cells were seeded on 24-well plates (80,000 cells per well) and incubated overnight before infection with CHIKV-122508 at MOI 10 for 1.5h at 37°C. Cell were then washed 3 times with PBS before being incubated with 0.1 μM bortezomib or vehicle control. Cells were washed once with PBS before total cellular RNA was extracted using the RNeasy Mini Kit (Qiagen) according to the manufacturer’s instructions.
